level.heading: CORRECTION OF CURRENT EROSION PROBLEMS (ยง 21-509)

level.text: 509.1 In instances where erosion is occurring as the result of natural forces or past land-disturbing activities, but in the absence of current land-disturbing activities, the Department shall have the authority to inspect the site and to order the property owner to correct the erosion problem.
509.2 Each order to correct existing problems shall specify the general corrective measures to be applied.
The Department shall maintain and provide to homeowners who are required to correct erosion problems information relating to possible sources of financial assistance for the project.
